definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
a certain number or amount/how many?/how much?
to rush like ducks (idiom); the mob scrabbles madly for sth unobtainable/an unruly crowd on a wild goose chase
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
Guo Moruo (1892-1978), writer, communist party intellectual and cultural apparatchik
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
to act as though there were nobody else present/unselfconscious/fig. without regard for others
to be a different person/not to be one's usual self

sentences.english: If you do, two loyalty counters are removed from that planeswalker.
sentences.chinese: 若你如此做，从该旅法师上移去两个忠诚度指示物。

sentences.english: Don't let unexpressed emotions build up inside of you.
sentences.chinese: 若你有强烈的情感，挑出它们表达他们。

sentences.english: Should the raw flesh change and turn white, he must go to the priest.
sentences.chinese: 红肉若复原，又变白了，他就要来见祭司。

sentences.english: If I want to buy a car, I have to offer enough money to get it.
sentences.chinese: 若我想买一辆车，便要支付足够的金钱。

sentences.english: Consult your legal counsel if you have any doubts about reusing content.
sentences.chinese: 若对重用内容有任何疑问，请咨询您的法律顾问。

sentences.english: You frown, you step, if the" grand rainbow."
sentences.chinese: 你一皱，你一步，若是彩虹绝罢的恢弘。

sentences.english: With strong and thick bodies, the characters appear abstract and simple and their hands either stretch or clench.
sentences.chinese: 人物身条浑厚，手指若伸若握，抽象简洁。

sentences.english: If seller's designs are used, the design numbers must be stated in full.
sentences.chinese: 若选用卖方花样，必须详细注明花号。

sentences.english: The total diameter of cavitation, if present, is less than 4cm.
sentences.chinese: 若出现空洞，其直径总和小于4厘米。

sentences.english: When you're the guest, you should just make yourself at home.
sentences.chinese: 你若是客人，只需使本人感到自正在就好了。

sentences.english: If you spend all the money you get, you will have to depend on pension when old.
sentences.chinese: 若把所有钱都“月光”掉，老了将只能靠养老金。

sentences.english: If Satan can't defeat us by a frontal attack, he will do it in a more subtle way.
sentences.chinese: 撒但若不能正面攻击我们，就会改用更巧妙的诡计。

sentences.english: The game is a draw if both teams lose at once.
sentences.chinese: 若两个队伍同时输掉，则该盘游戏为和局。

sentences.english: If the abdomen, should take the navel as a center.
sentences.chinese: 若是腹部，应以肚脐眼为中心。

sentences.english: Behaviour that may be rational for individual actors can cause chaos if everyone copies it.
sentences.chinese: 个人合理的行为，若是每个人都照样做就会造成混乱。

sentences.english: Had the policemen arrived immediately, the criminal would have been caught.
sentences.chinese: 若是警察立刻到，就会抓获罪犯。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
